title: Imagine Yourself Here Lounging Poolside,  or Mingling w/Neighbors
posting_body: Step into a lavish apartment bathed in natural light, follow gleaming bamboo plank floors to a contemporary kitchen.
Polished granite countertops and stainless-steel appliances invite you to prepare your favorite meals in style while ample cabinet space keeps everything tidy and clean.
Enjoy a spa-like experience in a lavish master bathroom that will give you a chance to relax and melt your cares away.
With a contemporary walk-in shower and a deep oval bathtub, your choice can change each day to match your mood.
Prices & Specials change daily, contact me for availability
